library.name: Alatau Creative Hub
library.address: microdistrict Naurkent, 5/11, floor 1, Alatau District, Almaty
library.description: A cozy creative hub and coworking zone that combines modern design with a calm studying environment. Ideal for students and freelancers.

library.name: Central City Library named after A.P. Chekhov
library.description: One of the oldest and largest libraries in Almaty, providing thousands of books, reading halls, and cultural events for all ages.

library.name: National Library of the Republic of Kazakhstan
library.description: Kazakhstan’s main national repository with millions of books, journals, and archives. A must-visit for researchers and scholars.

library.name: Zhambyl Youth Library
library.description: A bright and modern youth library offering workshops, English lessons, and reading zones with open access to digital media.

library.name: Republican Scientific and Technical Library
library.description: A specialized library focused on science and technology, featuring academic journals, patents, and engineering resources.

library.name: Al-Farabi Library
library.description: Located at Al-Farabi University, this library supports research and study with access to academic databases and quiet halls.

library.name: Almaty Library №20
library.description: A local community library that provides literature for children and adults with a comfortable family-friendly atmosphere.

library.name: Almaty Library №14
library.description: A small but cozy library offering a mix of fiction and educational materials for nearby residents and students.

library.name: Almaty Library №4
library.description: A peaceful reading spot in the east of Almaty, popular among students preparing for exams and quiet study sessions.

library.name: Almaty Library №6
library.description: A peaceful reading spot in the east of Almaty, popular among students preparing for exams and quiet study sessions.

cafe.name: Coffee Boom
cafe.description: A stylish café perfect for friendly meetings and quick coffee breaks. Offers desserts and takeaway drinks.

cafe.name: Coffee Boom
cafe.description: Bright and cozy café in the city center with strong Wi-Fi, power outlets, and plenty of comfortable seats for study or work.

cafe.name: Coffee Boom
cafe.description: A calm spot with modern interior and quality coffee beans. Popular among students and digital nomads.

cafe.name: Coffee Boom
cafe.description: A small café with a cozy corner atmosphere, offering fresh pastries and rich espresso-based drinks.

cafe.name: Zebra coffee
cafe.description: A trendy coffee bar with unique interior design and signature drinks. Ideal for relaxing or informal meetings.

cafe.name: Tary Almaty
cafe.description: Modern specialty café serving freshly roasted coffee and light meals. Great place for coffee lovers and professionals.

cafe.name: Urbo Coffee
cafe.description: Urban-style café with a relaxed atmosphere, premium beans, and calm background music. Perfect for afternoon breaks.

cafe.name: Syrniki
cafe.description: A small cozy café inside the market, known for delicious syrniki, homemade pastries, and friendly staff.

cafe.name: Global Coffee
cafe.description: Popular market café offering a mix of local and international coffee styles, smoothies, and snacks.

cafe.name: Master Coffee
cafe.description: A friendly neighborhood café with freshly brewed coffee, comfortable seats, and a quiet ambiance for focused work.

coworking.name: Mantis Creative Spaсe
coworking.description: A creative coworking space designed for freelancers and artists. Features modern interiors, quiet work areas, and networking events.

coworking.name: SmArt.Point
coworking.description: A modern coworking hub offering flexible offices, meeting rooms, and tech-friendly amenities in the Forum shopping complex.

coworking.name: OQ Coworking
coworking.description: Bright coworking space focused on startups and entrepreneurs. Offers 24/7 access, conference halls, and high-speed internet.

coworking.description: Comfortable and quiet workspace located in a residential area. Perfect for students, designers, and small creative teams.

coworking.description: Coworking zone inside Promenade Mall with cozy interiors, meeting spaces, and a café nearby for quick breaks.

coworking.name: Jas Coworking
coworking.description: Youth-oriented coworking center offering affordable desks, workshops, and a collaborative environment for students.

coworking.description: A small, tech-inspired coworking space with focus on developers and designers. Offers conference rooms and shared devices.

coworking.description: Quiet coworking spot with bright natural light, equipped meeting rooms, and flexible membership options.
